about_the_game:
Dig up and collect fossils from Dinosaurs and other prehistoric creatures, build complete skeletons from them, then display them in your customisable museum! Earn museum donations and renown in order to gain access to more dig sites, unlocking new species for you to collect.

Dig Sites

Explore many different dig sites, each which different fossils to find. Dig into the ground to uncover and collect these fossils. Purchase access to more dig sites to unlock new species for you to find. Drive around in your customisable truck, which is vital to be able to transport these fossils.

Museum

Skeletons can be built from gathered fossils, displayable in your museum. Show off your complete skeletons for a bonus to donations, which are important for purchasing and upgrading your museum. Build up your museum the way you want, creating the perfect location to show off your prehistoric collection to visitors.

Fossilpedia

Dinosaurs and other prehistoric creatures that you have found will be recorded in your Fossilpedia, full of educational information. Find and collect them all by unlocking all the dig sites, and uncovering the fossils they hide within.

name: Fossil Keeper

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.6GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 700 series
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
